body_html: ...actually, I take it back, there are a lot more differences between clang and nvcc. It would definitely be helpful to understand which are meaningful. I was operating on the assumption that TF wouldn't do things so crazy that we'd reasonably expect a difference in behavior with different compilers, but maybe that's wrong. :)
body_text: ...actually, I take it back, there are a lot more differences between clang and nvcc.  It would definitely be helpful to understand which are meaningful.  I was operating on the assumption that TF wouldn't do things so crazy that we'd reasonably expect a difference in behavior with different compilers, but maybe that's wrong.  :)
body: ...actually, I take it back, there are a lot more differences between clang and nvcc.  It would definitely be helpful to understand which are meaningful.  I was operating on the assumption that TF wouldn't do things so crazy that we'd reasonably expect a difference in behavior with different compilers, but maybe that's wrong.  :)
